content: a super warm and simple beanie that can be worn in two ways long and tall or with a folded brim worked bottom up and in the round provided in 3 sizes **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** **pattern updated 27/02/16 - please download the latest version** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/3050029/1-25#8 **yarn** 160 yd/140 m/100g chunky weight plied yarn **needles & notions** set 5mm/uk6/us8 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **gauge** 16 sts x 20 row to 4in/10cm on 5mm needles over st st **sizes** to fit sizes 19 21 23 in/48 53 25 58 5 cm finished size 16 18 20 in/40 5 45 75 50 75 cm **sample details** shown in jamieson & smith shetland chunky 160yd/148m per 100g 100% wool **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round increases & decreases specialist cast-on **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour published 2010 product code ww135kchunkeanie spanish version kindly translated by junitos 2 2 http //www juntitoscrafts blogspot it/
